txt.en: Gamling yells out, 'They are coming down the centre, straight for the main gate!'
<rgb=#FF0000>The tower has been severely damaged!</rgb>
'Glad to see you are here to aid the defence. We need all the able bodies we can get.'
<rgb=#00FF00>The enemy has been driven off and the horses are secure.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>The war machine has melted the main gate of the Dike!</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The stream has been protected and left open!</rgb>
'Nock your arrows, Rohirrim. The enemy marches!'
Helm's Dike - Solo
<rgb=#00FF00>The enemy's assault on the main gate has been repulsed!</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>Gamling's voice calls out, 'Their main force marches. Fall back! To the Hornburg!'</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>The main gate has been severely weakened!</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>Saruman's vile war machine has been destroyed.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Gamling has fallen! You have lost.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The tower, and scouts within, are secure!</rgb>
Gamling calls out, 'They are marching on the eastern end of the Dike!'
'I believe we have a few moments before the enemy will march. Take them and inspect the line.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Helm's Statue has been destroyed!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>The horses have been driven off!</rgb>
'When you are satisfied, come back and we shall confer. Be hasty, time is not on our side.'
<rgb=#00FF00>Helm's Statue has been protected from the enemy.</rgb>
Gamling calls out, 'They are marching on the western end of the Dike!'
<rgb=#FF0000>The Dunlendings have dammed up the stream!</rgb>
